v1.00				v1.01				v1.02
stb r0,0(r27)
lis r4,0x803E		lis r4,0x803F		lis r4,0x803F
ori r4,r4,0xEF54	ori r4,r4,0x0104	ori r4,r4,0x0DE4
li r6,4

NEXT_SLOT:
addi r4,r4,36
lbz r19,0(r4)
cmpwi r19,3
beq+ NORMAL
subi r6,r6,1
cmpwi r6,0
bne- NEXT_SLOT

LAGLESS:
lis r4,0x801C
ori r4,r4,0xAC04	ori r4,r4,0xB568	ori r4,r4,0xBBD4
lis r19,0x6000
stw r19,0(r4)
stw r19,896(r4)
stw r19,944(r4)
lis r19,0x4800
addi r19,r19,0x28
stw r19,808(r4)
b END

NORMAL:
lis r4,0x801C
ori r4,r4,0xAC04	ori r4,r4,0xB568	ori r4,r4,0xBBD4
lis r19,0x4800
addi r19,r19,0x0115
stw r19,0(r4)
lis r19,16770
addi r19,r19,40
stw r19,808(r4)
lis r19,18432
addi r19,r19,3013
stw r19,896(r4)
lis r19,19455
ori r19,r19,55157
stw r19,944(r4)
END:

PAL
@ 8025F12C
stb r0,0(r27)
lis r4,0x803F
ori r4,r4,0x1C50	# 803F1C50
li r6,4
NEXT_SLOT:
addi r4,r4,36
lbz r19,0(r4)
cmpwi r19,3
beq+ NORMAL
subi r6,r6,1
cmpwi r6,0
bne- NEXT_SLOT
LAGLESS:
lis r4,0x801C
ori r4,r4,0xD7F8	# 801CD7F8
lis r19,0x6000
stw r19,0(r4)
stw r19,896(r4)
stw r19,944(r4)
lis r19,0x4800

stw r19,808(r4)
b END
NORMAL:

ori r4,r4,0xD7F8	# 801CD7F8

This is an 8 bit value.
If NONE, 0x03
If HUMAN, 0x00
If CPU, 0x01
Player 1: 003EEF78	(003EEF77, 0047E859)
Player 2: 003EEF9C	(003EEF9B, 0047E87D)
Player 3: 003EEFC0	(003EEFBF, 0047E8A1)
Player 4: 003EEFE4	(003EEFE3, 0047E8C5)
